block.para: Shows how to use &REK; with the &JSBlong; to create an application to detect personal protective equipment (PPE) in images located in an &S3long; (&S3;) bucket. The app saves the results to an &DDBlong; table, and sends the admin an email notification with the results using &SESlong; (&SES;).
For complete source code and instructions on how to set up and run, see the full example on GitHub.
